messages.message: Hi team, I am working on a slack-integration feature so that system test can auto-tag test owners. I ran into some corner cases where certain account cannot be successfully tagged for some reason. Does anyone know exactly what text needs to be provided to the @{text} string to tag a user? Reversely, do we have a way to configure how we can be tagged on slack?
chances are this is the email id we need to use for slack mentioning
We use the email prefix for tagging golden users - so if the email id is `<mailto:aayush.dutt@instabase.com|aayush.dutt@instabase.com>` tagging with `@aayush.dutt` tags the correct person.
